attributes.action: Parking Permits on Aire View, Silsden.
attributes.additional_details:
Cars are regularly bumped due to the lack of space.
Many residents are unable to park outside, or near their own home. Sometimes they have to park a street(s) away.
These problems are causing residents to move away from the area.
attributes.background:
Aire View is a busy road. With an infant and junior school, shop and laundrette at one end and shops at the other - this end is also single yellows.
The road is always double parked and is blocked off when people are having things delivered, which causes disruption and angers other road users.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parking permits are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
